CHAT.comment: Peter and his mother came by train from their NJ vacation home expressly so that Peter could be here for these two sessions. Jennifer stayed with Mother's mother overnight. Peter and Mother returned by bus to NJ immediately after the session on July 13. Peter's father works in the city all week , going to the shore only for weekends and he did not make either trip with Peter and Mother. Peter was very active and talkative both days. He was somewhat more aggressive than usual , perhaps because he has been accustomed to playing outside in the past few weeks. He is being toilet trained and did not wear diapers except when Mother dressed him for the return trip or when he ran out of training pants following several"accidents" the first day.

One general characteristic of Peter's language that was striking at this session was the elaborate reports he produced when asked by Mother to recall some past event. Whereas in the past , he had merely imitated part of the question ( MOT: did you ride the bus last night? PET: bus last night). He now responded with whole "paragraphs" about the kite he flew , the train he rode , the fire engine he rode , ect. There was some of this during session14 especially regarding the motorcycle he had ridden with his Uncle Bill , but it was more common here. Note: new toys include the farm animals which he had previously seen only briefly at the video tape session months ago.
